comments.purpose: Satellite ingress node; connects to origin, serves feeder uploads/downloads, and relays control messages
comments.onboarding: Default template; usually set node.name unique per satellite, confirm origin_host/origin_port, and start: python satellite.py. Allow origin + feeders to reach listen_port; keep TLS cert/key from origin bundle

network.listen_host: Bind address for control/feeder traffic (0.0.0.0 = all interfaces)
network.listen_port: Satellite control/data port (here 8890); feeders/origin connect inbound
network.origin_host: Origin control-plane address for outbound sync
network.repair_rpc_port: Port used for repair RPCs (7888 default); ensure origin can reach if used

paths.cert: TLS cert issued/approved by origin (client/server auth)
paths.key: Private key for this satellite cert
paths.origin_pubkey: Origin public key for verifying control messages

sync.node_sync_interval: Seconds between heartbeats to origin (advertises reachability)
sync.registry_sync_interval: Seconds between registry refreshes from origin
sync.origin_pubkey_url: Where to fetch origin public key if missing
sync.list_json_url: Where to fetch trusted node registry if missing

comments.notes: Limits/placement/feeder API keys are centralized at origin; this satellite does not set local policy. Keep clock in sync (NTP) for TLS.
